Combat
Hit Points: 19 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (strength; trained)
Armor: Half Plate Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Greatclub (+8 1d10+3 B; strength; expert); Light Pick (+8 1d4+3 P [Crit d8]; strength; expert); Spiked Gauntlet (+8 1d4+3 P; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) May make a melee Strike on foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Point-Blank Shot: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Power Attack: (2) May make a melee Strike that inflicts 1 extra dice damage and counts as two Strikes for multiple attack penalty
Shield Block: (R) When shield is raised, may negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
